title: Save
subtitle: the date
what-text1: We would like to invite you to our vow renewal on 13/04/2024 (our fifth wedding anniversary). There is a ceremony planned, followed by dinner and an afterparty to celebrate.
what-text2: We would love to see you shine in a stylish and colourful outfit that makes you feel beautiful and ready to party.
accomodation-text: A lot of you are coming from far, to make your search for a location easier we've made a list with some suggestions:
gifts-text1: This celebration wouldnâ€™t be the same without your presence. Our top priority of this party is for all of us to have a good time and make memories together.
gifts-text2: When it comes to presents, we would appreciate a kind donation and perhaps some ideas for our honeymoon that is still awaiting to be experienced. If you want to give us a physical gift, we would greatly appreciated something preloved.
